short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple reminder everytime you open a new tab that your body is tracking macros even when you don't!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tracking your macros doesn't have to be hard! With a friendly reminder every time you open up a new tab, you'll be sure to stay on the regimen!
